thread.title: Slovenia reopens border to flood of migrants PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Slovenia reopens border to flood of migrants | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Slovenia reopens border to flood of migrants PBS NewsHour
text: Migrants were trapped at a rain-soaked crossing between Croatia and Slovenia after Hungary closed its border. As countries fought over limits in the numbers of people they would accept, thousands found their own paths across the frontier and Slovenia reopened its official border. Special correspondent Malcolm Brabant reports on how governments are struggling with the flow of migrants.
